fullText: Nina Arianda brings fierce intelligence and surprising depth to the archetypal dumb blonde role of Billie Dawn in the Broadway revival of Garson Kanin's Born Yesterday.
dtliExcerpt: Nina Arianda brings fierce intelligence and surprising depth to the archetypal dumb blonde role of Billie Dawn in the Broadway revival of Garson Kanin's Born Yesterday.
